duties_responsibilities.duty: Shop and fulfill customer's online orders, focusing on product quality and freshness, and substituting potential out-of-stock items.
Process order transactions using the in-store POS system and provide excellent customer service.
Serve as an online ambassador for the store, answering questions about order delivery and the Instacart platform.
Assist in other areas of the store by stocking shelves, filling the frozen food bins, and maintaining store cleanliness.
